page.title: 11 Childrens games
page.content: (KERBY.)To play kirby you need a ball. A kerb or some steps will do for two players to throw the ball at in turn. One player throws whilst the other has to catch it or throw from where it lands.After ten goes the person with most misses has lost. (Scarecrow tigs.)To play scarecrow tigs you can have as many players as you like.One person is on and trys to catch the others.If the player tigs you,you must stand with your legs open like a scarecrow.If someone goes through your legs you are free and can run about again.The game ends when all the are caught. (PEGS.)Two team,3 pegs leaning against a wall in the shape of a "n" Players throw a ball at the pegs,if the pegs are knocked down,the throwers team run away.The fielders catch the throwers by hitting them with the ball.
